title: Welcome to Casa Rustica De Haan
description: If you're looking for the ideal place for a family vacation on the beautiful Belgian coast, look no further. Our charming vacation home in De Haan is the perfect spot for you and your loved ones, accommodating up to 8 people.
spaciousDescription: Our spacious family home provides plenty of room for the entire family (8-10 persons in 4 rooms) to relax and enjoy the Belgian coast together.
modern: Modern Comfort: You'll find all the modern comforts for a relaxing vacation here, with a fully equipped kitchen, comfortable bedrooms, and a welcoming living room.
gardenDescription: Unwind in our peaceful garden or on the sunny terrace while enjoying a family barbecue or soaking up the sun.
beachDescription: Just a few steps away from De Haan's beach, you can enjoy sunny days by the sea and pleasant walks along the beach.
family: For the Whole Family: Our house is designed to accommodate families, with child-friendly amenities, including cribs and board games for quality moments together.
book: Book today for an unforgettable vacation in De Haan, where you can relax, have fun, and create precious memories with your family. We look forward to welcoming you to Casa Rustica De Haan for an exceptional seaside experience.
leave: Leave your email and we will get back to you.
